en.title: Preventing Cat Obesity: Tips for Maintaining a Healthy Weight
en.content:
Cat obesity increases the risk of various health issues including diabetes, joint diseases, and urinary tract disorders. Indoor cats especially need attention since their exercise is limited.

How to Identify a Healthy Weight

Use the Body Condition Score (BCS) to assess your cat. The ideal condition (BCS 3 on a 5-point scale) is when you can feel the ribs through a thin layer of fat and see a slight waist when viewed from above.

Diet Management to Prevent Obesity

Follow the feeding amounts listed on the food package, and keep treats to within 10% of daily total calories. After neutering or spaying, metabolism decreases, so it is recommended to reduce food portions by 10 to 15%.

Exercise Tips

Ensure about 15 to 20 minutes of play time every day. Cat wands, laser pointers (end with a treat for a sense of achievement), and puzzle feeders are effective. Providing a cat tree for vertical movement is also important.

zh.title: 猫咪肥胖预防：维持健康体重的要点
zh.content:
猫咪肥胖会增加糖尿病、关节疾病、泌尿系统疾病等多种健康风险。尤其是室内猫，运动量受到限制，更需要注意。

如何判断适当体重

可以使用体况评分（BCS）来判断。理想状态（5级评分中的第3级）是隔着薄薄的脂肪能摸到肋骨，从上方看有轻微的腰部曲线。

通过饮食管理预防肥胖

按照猫粮包装上标注的喂食量喂食，零食不超过每日总热量的10%。绝育后代谢会降低，建议将食量减少10%至15%。

运动方面的建议

每天确保约15至20分钟的游戏时间。逗猫棒、激光笔（最后用零食奖励给予成就感）、益智喂食器都很有效。设置猫爬架增加上下运动的机会也很重要。
